description:
The Takanashis live in a typical home in Hokkaido. But, beneath the shell of a regular household lies a cruel hierarchy of power. Surrounded by predators (his older sisters), Sota lives a day-to-day struggle to survive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sota`s Melancholy, the Women of the Takanashi
Souta no Yuuutsu, Takanashi-ke no Onna-tachi
宗太の憂鬱, 小鳥遊家の女達
